img.alt: Rose Academies Logo - Public Tucson High Schools

div.p: Governor Ducey has announced mandatory closure through the end of the school year.
Rose Students will continue to have access to their coursework online from home.
June 1st - 26th

img.alt: Banner Displaying Charter School Tucson Letter Grades for all locations.
Charter school tucson classroom with kids learning from a teacher.

div.p: Rose offers 3 sessions to accommodate your schedule!
We understand life gets busy! Rose offers three conveinent sessions for you to choose from.

Morning 7:00am-12:00pm
Afternoon 12:00pm- 5:00pm
Evening 5:00pm to 10:00pm

img.alt: Shu Ha Ri saying on a white background.

div.p: Shu-Ha-Ri
Rose Signature Program

Shu-Ha-Ri, The Art of Learning, is a Rose Academies signature program. This unique program is designed for students to be able to: discover who they are and test their future dreams, learn how to plan, and express and advocate for themselves.

div.p: Parents/Students:
Teachers will be available online for students between 8-4:30 Monday-Friday during the closure to support students in their online coursework.

We realize as we move to full online schooling that some students may not have access to the internet or a computer. If this is the case, please call the school to arrange packet work that can be picked up and completed from home. There is a limited staff at the school Monday-Friday 8-4:30 to allow students to pick up work.
School Resource Pages:

R.O.S.E™ Academies is the premier, non-traditional charter school that puts your students’ needs first. With self-paced courses and a team of onsite, supportive teachers who care, we help you win and meet your goals, every time.
Unlike traditional schools, a charter school focuses on the individualized experience and helps you as a student thrive in ways traditional education systems cannot cater to, due to their sheer size.

p.strong: An Investment In Education Will Pay Interest Over a Lifetime

div.p: Ever wondered what you could be in the future or even more so how to get there - it all starts with education. No matter what age or where you are in life, this is what shapes us from what we currently are, into what we will become. At ROSE charter school, not only do we help guide that the path, but we help you discover all your capabilities along the way.

Because of this, we have never been more proud than we are to be a part of the successful education of Tucson Charter School students over the years. Our unique approach allows students to take control of their academic success today, for the benefit of their futures tomorrow!

div.h2: A Leading Charter School In Tucson

img.alt: Rose Academies Charter School Tucson graduate getting a pin put on them.

div.p: To separate ourselves from traditional education we focus on what high school students want; a small, friendly environment that puts an emphasis on personalized needs. Because of that, all of our teachers are caring guides who work with your kids students on an individualized basis, in engaging classrooms, to help them meet and exceed all of their goals.

Beyond being a Charter School Tucson can trust, at ROSE Academies we help to provide continued success after high school for young adults. Our Rose Personal Progress Planners can help students set and achieve post-graduation goals on a continued basis, long after they have left our campuses.

p.strong: Come experience the difference at a ROSE Academy Charter School in Tucson.

img.alt: Text explaining how Rose Academies charter school can help with credit recovery in Tucson.
